thread.title: Hundreds protest in Brooklyn over police shooting

title: Hundreds protest in Brooklyn over police shooting
text:
Hundreds protest in Brooklyn over police shooting 8:12am BST - 01:15 
Protesters rallied over the fatal shooting of 34-year-old Saheed Vassell who was shot by police after he pointed a metal pipe at them. Local media reported that Vassell had a history of mental illness. The death is the latest in a string of fatal shootings by police of unarmed black men in the country. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
